text:
Uh, um... Producer-san,
C-Can you look at yesterday's notes...?
Oh, you brought them! Thanks, let me take a look.

...So these are the new steps you learned today? You've written
in detail about how to keep the rhythm and the tips for movements.

You've learned a lot of other things too...
You worked hard, Koito.

O-Of course!
This much is easy for me...!

T-This much,
everyone else can do too.

S-So, just achieving this much isn't something
to be happy about, I should strive for more──...

If there's something you've accomplished
or something new you've learned.
That's something to be happy about.

So, write it down here again and let me know, what
made Koito happy about being able to do something.
